post.body: we are just getting more vintage, and yes, they are getting more hardened by their circumstance, methinks

His seat up front (due to behavior) allowed him to observe how I worked on kids in the 'hot seat'. lol!
One of my kids summed me up best, when he asked, "Miss Barbara, are you going to give one of your angel-talks, now?" I was speechless.
also, I have a soft center, and must keep my candy shell intact! They still sniff me out, though. When I let my nazi guard down... lol!
